Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ Member() [1/2]

discpp::Member::Member ( const Snowflake &  id,
discpp::Guild &  guild,
bool  can_request = false 
)

Constructs a discpp::Member object using its id and the guild that it is in.

This constructor searches the guild's member cache to get a member object.

If you set can_request to true, and the message is not found in cache, then we will request the message from the REST API. But if its not true, and its not found, an exception will be thrown of DiscordObjectNotFound.

Parameters
[in]idThe id of the member.
[in]guildThe guild the member is in.
[in]can_requestWhether or not the library can request the message from the REST API.
Returns
discpp::Member, this is a constructor.

bool discpp::Member::HasPermission ( const discpp::Permission &  perm)

void discpp::Member::ModifyMember ( const std::string &  nick,
std::vector< discpp::Role > &  roles,
const bool  mute,
const bool  deaf,
const Snowflake &  channel_id 
)

Modifies this guild member.

member.ModifyMember("Member nick", roles, true, false, 657246994997444614);
Parameters
[in]nickThe new member nickname.
[in]rolesThe new member role.
[in]muteWhether or not the member is muted in voice channels.
[in]deafWhether or not the member is deafened in voice channels.
[in]channel_idThe voice channel to move them to if they're connected to one.
Returns
void

◆ guild_id

discpp::Snowflake discpp::Member::guild_id

The ID of the guild this member is in.

◆ joined_at

time_t discpp::Member::joined_at

When the user joined the guild.

◆ nick

std::string discpp::Member::nick

This members guild nickname. If the member has no nickname, its a nullptr.

◆ premium_since

time_t discpp::Member::premium_since

When the user started boosting the guild.

◆ presence

std::unique_ptr<discpp::Presence> discpp::Member::presence = nullptr

Presence for the current member. If the member has no presence, its a nullptr.
